Bella’s Dentist Adventure: Health Lesson 1

Hi friends! Today I am going to visit the dentist.

Do you know why we visit the dentist?

My mother told me that my dentist helps keep my teeth healthy. He wants to make sure I am not eating too many sweets, but sweets are so delicious! Why do you think sweets are so bad for our teeth? Right, it’s the sugar! Sugar seems to settle down in our teeth. Once it gets there, it’s hard to remove all of it. This is why we need to brush our teeth after meals. Different foods can also be harmful to our teeth by discoloring them My mom loves coffee, but she says she has to brush her teeth after so her teeth don’t turn yellow!

Oh boy all this sounds like a lot of work, but that’s why we need to see the dentist!

Let’s see how your teeth are doing by answering these questions…
